onboarding_1_title: Keep track of your net worth easily
onboarding_1_subtitle: Add your assets, liabilities and investments to know the value of your net worth in real time. With Wealth Guard, market investments are automatically tracked day by day
onboarding_2_title: Monitor the performance of your investments
onboarding_2_subtitle: Keep track of your stock or ETF investments with interactive charts and KPIs.
onboarding_3_subtitle: Get valuable insights into the status and performance of your net worth.
onboarding_4_title: Why should you track your net worth?
onboarding_4_subtitle:
Tracking net worth provides a clear snapshot of your overall financial situation. It helps you to:
1. Achieve a clear overview of your financial position
2. Set and monitor progress toward financial goals
3. Identify areas for improvement in saving or investing
4. Plan more effectively for retirement.
onboarding_5_title: Your data does not leave your phone
onboarding_5_subtitle:
Your data are stored inside the phone and they are not sent to any server.
If you want, you can share/backup your data with the "Export" function.

ticker_search_subtitle: Search by name, ticker or ISIN:
what_is_a_share_split_content:
A stock split increases the number of shares in a company. For example, after a 2-for-1 split, each investor will own double the number of shares, and each share will be worth half as much.

A company may split its stock when the market price per share is so high that it becomes unwieldy when traded. One of the reasons is that a very high share price may deter small investors from buying the shares. Stock splits are usually initiated after a large run up in share price.
monthly_reminder_subtitle: Receive a notification every end of the month to remember to update your assets
